refnamediv.refpurpose: Display RLE images on a MacIntosh display.

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: This program displays an RLE5 file on a MacIntosh display. It uses a dithering technique to take a full-color or gray scale image into the limited number of colors available.
Clicking on the close box or typing a q exits the program and returns to the MPW shell. All other event processing is suspended until the program exits.

listitem.para: Name of the RLE5 file to display. If not specified, the image will be read from the standard input.

refsect1.title: AUTHOR
refsect1.para: Spencer W. Thomas, University of Utah

refsect1.title: BUGS
refsect1.para: Behaves unpredictably when it runs out of memory. If you have 2mb or less, don't run under multifinder.
